alert.note: Alert for Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 2:47PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 30 to 40 mph this afternoon. * WHERE...Western third of Sweetwater County including Rock Springs and Green River. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Significant blowing and drifting of snow is expected. Prolonged road closures are expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
